channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
I am trying to compile my 508 but each time i do it prints this:
javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
This is the compiler i am using:
@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin
I'm guessing it has something to do with my Javac.exe, like its not there or something..I have checked in the bin of jdk1.7_03 and its there. Does anyone have any ideas of what could the be the problem?
Cheers Ben

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @pkrs_pure pkrs pure
item.description:
@pkrs_pure wrote:

I am trying to compile my 508 but each time i do it prints this:

javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

This is the compiler i am using:

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_03\bin

I’m guessing it has something to do with my Javac.exe, like its not there or something…I have checked in the bin of jdk1.7_03 and its there. Does anyone have any ideas of what could the be the problem?

Cheers
Ben
